mapper.insert: insert into hz_sys_notice (id, title, content, remark, job_id, `type`, `state`, create_time, read_time, creator) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{readTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update hz_sys_notice set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, read_time = #{readTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, title, content, remark, job_id, `type`, `state`, create_time, read_time, creator from hz_sys_notice where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, title, content, remark, job_id, `type`, `state`, create_time, read_time, creator from hz_sys_notice
